channel.title: CVE Feed for SonicWall -- SonicWall Global VPN Client
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SonicWall -- SonicWall Global VPN Client

item.title: CVE-2021-20037|2024-08-03T17:30:07.615Z -- sonicwall -- sonicwall%20global%20vpn%20client
item.description: SonicWall Global VPN Client 4.10.5 installer (32-bit and 64-bit) incorrect default file permission vulnerability leads to privilege escalation which potentially allows command execution in the host operating system. This vulnerability impacts GVC 4.10.5 installer and earlier.

item.title: CVE-2021-20047|2024-08-03T17:30:07.429Z -- sonicwall -- sonicwall%20global%20vpn%20client
item.description: SonicWall Global VPN client version 4.10.6 (32-bit and 64-bit) and earlier have a DLL Search Order Hijacking vulnerability. Successful exploitation via a local attacker could result in remote code execution in the target system.

item.title: CVE-2021-20051|2024-08-03T17:30:07.581Z -- sonicwall -- sonicwall%20global%20vpn%20client
item.description: SonicWall Global VPN Client 4.10.7.1117 installer (32-bit and 64-bit) and earlier versions have a DLL Search Order Hijacking vulnerability in one of the installer components. Successful exploitation via a local attacker could result in command execution in the target system.
